how_to_use_comparator.title: How to use the Build comparator

how_to_use_comparator.step.view_differen: Tap a bar to jump to the corresponding build
advanced_options_comparator.title: Advanced options
advanced_options_comparator.step.import_: Import a saved build to compare
advanced_options_comparator.step.sort_se: Select the sorting mode that fits you best
Long-press a sort button to view its name
actions_comparator.title: Available actions
actions_comparator.label_copy_to_finder: Copy stats to the Build Finder and use as a base
tips_comparator.title: Pro tip
tips_comparator.limit_sets: Limit to 2–3 builds for clearer comparison and focus on your key stats
